@sio.event
async def connect(connection_id: str, environ: dict) -> None:

        latest_event_id_str = query_params.get('latest_event_id', [-1])[0]

        conversation_id = query_params.get('conversation_id', [None])[0]
        logger.info(f"ä¼šè¯è¿æ¥è¯·æ±‚ï¼šconversation_id={conversation_id}, connection_id={connection_id}")
        
        # è§£ææä¾›è€…é›†åˆï¼ˆå¦‚æ”¯æŒçš„LLMæä¾›å•†åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œç”¨äºé™åˆ¶å¯ç”¨èµ„æºï¼‰
        raw_list = query_params.get('providers_set', [])

            providers_list.extend(item.split(',') if isinstance(item, str) else [])

        # æ ¡éªŒä¼šè¯IDæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        if not conversation_id:

        if _invalid_session_api_key(query_params):

        cookies_str = environ.get('HTTP_COOKIE', '')

        authorization_header = environ.get('HTTP_AUTHORIZATION', None)
        
        # åˆ›å»ºä¼šè¯éªŒè¯å™¨ï¼Œæ ¡éªŒç”¨æˆ·èº«ä»½ï¼ˆå…³è”ä¼šè¯IDã€Cookieã€æˆæƒå¤´ï¼‰
        conversation_validator = create_conversation_validator()

        # åˆ›å»ºäº‹ä»¶å­˜å‚¨å®ä¾‹ï¼ˆç”¨äºè¯»å–ä¼šè¯å†å²äº‹ä»¶ï¼‰
        try:

        # åˆ›å»ºå¼‚æ­¥äº‹ä»¶å­˜å‚¨åŒ…è£…å™¨ï¼Œä»latest_event_id+1å¼€å§‹å›æ”¾äº‹ä»¶ï¼ˆé¿å…é‡å¤ï¼‰

        async for event in async_store:

            elif isinstance(event, AgentStateChangedObservation):

        if agent_state_changed:

        conversation_init_data = await setup_init_conversation_settings(

        agent_loop_info = await conversation_manager.join_conversation(
